verbs.description: A new bombshell [V: was] dropped yesterday in the legal troubles for Trump when NBC News reported that the feds had Michael Cohen ’s phones and email tapped for weeks leading up to the raid on his home and office . And at least one call was recorded between Cohen and Trump . Federal investigators have wiretapped the phone …
